page.title: 05POPULATION
page.content: WE DECIDED TO FIND OUT WHAT TYPE OF PEOPLE LIVE IN BATTLE. TO DO THIS WE COUNTED ONE HUNDRED PEOPLE PASSING BY, EXCLUDING ANY WHO WERE OBVIOUSLY TOURISTS. MOST OF THE PEOLE WE SAW SEEMED TO BE MIDDLE AGED OR OLD, BUT WE FOUND THAT A SIMILAR COUNT TAKEN AT THE WEEKEND SHOWED A HIGHER PROPORTION OF YOUNG PEOPLE. WE FOUND THAT BATTLE DOES HAVE A LARGE POPULATION OF OLDER PEOPLE BECAUSE THE COST OF HOUSING IS HIGH SO YOUNG COUPLES CANNOT OFTEN AFFORD TO LIVE HERE. THER ARE ALSO FEW {JOBS}AVAILABLE IN BATTLE AS IT HAS NO {INDUSTRIES}SO YOUNG PEOPLE WILL NOT MOVE HERE. THE OLDER PEOPLE LIKE BATTLE BECAUSE IT IS SO QUIET, BUT THE YOUNG PEOPLE FIND THERE IS HARDLY ANYTHING TO DO. THIS MEANS THAT YOUNG PEOPLE ARE CONTINUING TO MOVE AWAY AND BATTLE'S{POPULATION}IS GETTING OLDER.
